titleStmt.title: A serious debate, and general concern, relating to health and sickness. By E.M. Med. D.
titleStmt.author: Maynwaringe, Everard, 1628-1699?

editionStmt.edition: The second impression with a postscript.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Basset, at the George in Fleetstreet; and Thomas Horne, at the south-entrance of the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
